backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that defines an Inquiry type and provides a submitContactForm function to store contact form submissions with validation for required fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features (hero, about, products, why-choose-us, contact sections) with associated files, components, test IDs, and high confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing the EVARON website components, hooks, styling, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for the EVARON brand including backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets up the root div and loads the main React application from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component that renders the complete EVARON website by composing Hero, About, Products, WhyChooseUs, Contact, and Footer sections.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section component displaying EVARON's value propositions with three icon cards (Battery, Shield, Zap) and detailed description of battery solutions.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact form component with name/email/message inputs, backend submission via React Query mutation, validation, toast notifications, and contact information display.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with EVARON logo, quick links, social media icons (Facebook, X, LinkedIn, Instagram), copyright notice, and caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-screen hero section with background image overlay, bold headline 'Powering the Future of Energy', subheading, and Contact Us button that smoothly scrolls to the contact form.
React component displaying three product cards (EV Lithium Battery, Solar Storage Battery, Industrial Battery Pack) with images, icons, titles, and descriptions in a responsive grid layout with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUsSecti: React component showcasing four key benefits (Long Life Cycle, Fast Charging, High Safety Standards, Energy Efficient) with icons and descriptions in a responsive grid with hover animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Custom React hook providing a mutation for submitting contact form data to the backend actor with automatic query invalidation on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom EVARON brand colors (orange, black), design tokens for light/dark themes, and utility classes for brand-specific styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom colors (including brand-orange), typography, animations, and theme extensions with OKLCH color space support.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking implemented features, architectural notes, and image requirements for the EVARON battery company single-page website with five main sections.
